metadata.title: Majestic Pet Fusion Navy Large Round Pet Bed
features: 7 oz Cotton Twill fabric zippered slipcover
Made in USA of US and imported materials
Package Dimensions: 23.0" L x 18.0" W x 16.0" H
description: Give your furry friend a comfy place to curl up indoors. The Majestic Pet Round Pet Bed is the perfect combination of style, function and comfort. It features a removable zippered slipcover that is woven from Cotton Twill. The base of the bed is made of heavy duty waterproof 300/600 Denier fabric, which protects against spills or accidents. Each bed is filled with a super plush fiberfill that provides ample amounts of comfort. To wash: Spot clean the slipcover with a mild detergent and hang dry. Dimensions (in Inch): Small - 30 x 30 x 4; Medium - 36 x 36 x 5; Large - 42 x 42 x 5.
